page.title: 16WILDEN'S INTERESTING PEOPLE.
page.content: Wilden boasts 3 artists, the most well-known being {David Green}, the water-colour artist. {Graham Jones,} whose side line is painting pub signs, art teacher, lives in the old School House. {Monica Clare,}well known for her lovely trees and skyscapes. {Group Captain L.S.Snaith}-youngest member of the seaplane team who captured world speed record in 1931, 3rd consecutive year, winning the Schneider Trophy outright. {Frank L.Godber DFC,}brother of late Lord Godber, well-known Beds. family, ex flying boat pilot during war, now meteorologist at R.A.E. Thurleigh since 1974. {Chrissie Stapleton,}76 years young, blind, but with a marvellous sense of humour. Plays the piano, and organ for church, chapel and school, and anyone who asks! A remarkable much loved lady
